fixed_field.name: RequestID
fixed_field.interpretation: Local request ID for use in confirm event

fixed_field.name: RequestID
fixed_field.interpretation: Local request ID for use in confirm event

fixed_field.name: RequestedPeriodicRate
fixed_field.interpretation: Must be specified for periodic event, and set to 0 for every change

variable_length_field.name: QueryMessage
variable_length_field.interpretation: The JAUS Query message to be used by the receiving component to generate the report message(s)
